title: A Muslim Father, a Soldier’s Ultimate Sacrifice
title_page: A Muslim Father, a Soldier’s Ultimate Sacrifice - The New York Times
text:
A Muslim Father, a Soldier’s Ultimate Sacrifice
When Eugene Richards heard the emotional remarks of Khizr Khan, whose son died in action in Iraq, he realized their paths had crossed during a moment of grief at Arlington National Cemetery.
